basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Steve Gant. Before joining Code Fellows I worked as an inside sales rep for an HVAC wholesaler. I wore many hats during my time there and really enjoyed it. But I began to feel I was at a dead end in my career there and decided to make a career change and become a Full Stack Software Developer.

projects.title: choose your own adventure
projects.description: Choose Your Own Adventure is an interactive story that allows users to change the outcome of the story based on choices made throughout the story. The app was built using HTML, Vanilla JavaScript and CSS.

projects.title: odd duck
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
